definitions.definition: A tumultuous disturbance of the public peace by a large group of people, often involving violence or damage to property.
examples: The protests began peacefully but turned into riots after several days.
In summer this flower garden is a riot of colour.

definitions.definition: A humorous or entertaining event or person.
Wanton or unrestrained behavior or emotion .
Excessive and expensive feasting ; wild and loose festivity; revelry .

main_definition: A tumultuous disturbance of the public peace by a large group of people, often involving violence or damage to property.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A wide and unconstrained variety.
( colloquial , uncountable ) A humorous or entertaining event or person.
Wanton or unrestrained behavior or emotion .
( obsolete ) Excessive and expensive feasting ; wild and loose festivity; revelry .
